items.name: Optimize Performance
items.purpose: Applies various registry tweaks to improve system responsiveness.
items.on: Set-ItemProperty -Path 'HKLM:\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Session Manager\Memory Management' -Name 'DisablePagingExecutive' -Value 1 -Type DWORD -Force; Set-ItemProperty -Path 'HKLM:\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\PriorityControl' -Name 'Win32PrioritySeparation' -Value 38 -Type DWORD -Force; Set-ItemProperty -Path 'HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Multimedia\SystemProfile' -Name 'NetworkThrottlingIndex' -Value 4294967295 -Type DWORD -Force
items.off: Set-ItemProperty -Path 'HKLM:\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Session Manager\Memory Management' -Name 'DisablePagingExecutive' -Value 0 -Type DWORD -Force; Set-ItemProperty -Path 'HKLM:\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\PriorityControl' -Name 'Win32PrioritySeparation' -Value 2 -Type DWORD -Force; Set-ItemProperty -Path 'HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Multimedia\SystemProfile' -Name 'NetworkThrottlingIndex' -Value 10 -Type DWORD -Force

items.name: Disable Compatibility Assistant
items.purpose: Disables the program compatibility assistant that warns about older programs.

items.name: Disable Print Service
items.purpose: Disables the spooler service if you don't use a printer.

items.name: Disable Fax Service
items.purpose: Disables the built-in Windows fax service.

items.name: Disable Sticky Keys
items.purpose: Disables the accessibility feature for keyboard shortcuts.

items.name: Ultimate Performance
items.purpose: Enables the 'Ultimate Performance' power plan for maximum speed.

items.name: Max Core Boot
items.purpose: Configures Windows to use the maximum number of CPU cores during boot.

items.name: Long Paths
items.purpose: Allows Windows to use file paths longer than 260 characters.

items.name: Windows/Office Activation (legally problematic)
items.purpose: This is for internal or testing use only and can have legal implications.

items.name: Disable Sensor Services
items.purpose: Turns off services for things like brightness sensors, location, etc.

items.name: Disable Modern Standby
items.purpose: Forces the system to use traditional sleep mode instead of Modern Standby.

items.name: Disable Windows Defender
items.purpose: Turns off the built-in antivirus and anti-malware protection.

items.name: Disable User Account Control (UAC)
items.purpose: Turns off the security feature that prompts for permission when programs make changes.

items.name: Disable Remote Desktop
items.purpose: Prevents remote connections to your computer.

items.name: Disable SmartScreen
items.purpose: Disables the Windows security feature that blocks unrecognized apps.

items.name: Disable TPM Check
items.purpose: Disables the check for the Trusted Platform Module during setup or upgrades.

items.name: Disable Virtualization Based Security
items.purpose: Disables security features like HVCI and Memory Integrity.

items.name: Disable Superfetch
items.purpose: Disables the service that preloads frequently used applications into RAM.

items.name: Disable Hibernation
items.purpose: Turns off the hibernation feature and deletes the hiberfil.sys file.

items.name: Disable NTFS Timestamp
items.purpose: Stops updating the last-access timestamp on files and folders.

items.name: Disable Search Indexing
items.purpose: Disables the service that indexes files to speed up search.

items.name: Disable Telemetry Services
items.purpose: Disables data collection services.
items.on: Set-Service -Name DiagTrack -StartupType Disabled; Stop-Service -Name DiagTrack -Force; Set-Service -Name dmwappushservice -StartupType Disabled; Stop-Service -Name dmwappushservice -Force
items.off: Set-Service -Name DiagTrack -StartupType Automatic; Start-Service -Name DiagTrack; Set-Service -Name dmwappushservice -StartupType Automatic; Start-Service -Name dmwappushservice

items.name: Disable Telemetry Tasks
items.purpose: Removes scheduled tasks for telemetry collection.
items.on: Get-ScheduledTask -TaskName 'Microsoft\Windows\Application Experience\Microsoft Compatibility Appraiser' | Disable-ScheduledTask; Get-ScheduledTask -TaskName 'Microsoft\Windows\Application Experience\ProgramDataUpdater' | Disable-ScheduledTask; Get-ScheduledTask -TaskName 'Microsoft\Windows\Customer Experience Improvement Program\Consolidator' | Disable-ScheduledTask
items.off: Get-ScheduledTask -TaskName 'Microsoft\Windows\Application Experience\Microsoft Compatibility Appraiser' | Enable-ScheduledTask; Get-ScheduledTask -TaskName 'Microsoft\Windows\Application Experience\ProgramDataUpdater' | Enable-ScheduledTask; Get-ScheduledTask -TaskName 'Microsoft\Windows\Customer Experience Improvement Program\Consolidator' | Enable-ScheduledTask

items.name: Disable Office Telemetry
items.purpose: Disables data collection in Microsoft Office applications.

items.name: Disable NVIDIA Telemetry
items.purpose: Disables data collection in NVIDIA graphics drivers.
items.on: Set-Service -Name NvTelemetryContainer -StartupType Disabled; Stop-Service -Name NvTelemetryContainer -Force; Set-ItemProperty -Path 'HKLM:\SOFTWARE\NVIDIA Corporation\NvControlPanel2\Client' -Name 'OptInOrOutPreference' -Value 0 -Type DWORD -Force
items.off: Set-Service -Name NvTelemetryContainer -StartupType Automatic; Start-Service -Name NvTelemetryContainer; Remove-ItemProperty -Path 'HKLM:\SOFTWARE\NVIDIA Corporation\NvControlPanel2\Client' -Name 'OptInOrOutPreference' -Force

items.name: Disable Visual Studio Telemetry
items.purpose: Disables data collection in Visual Studio.

items.name: Disable Edge Telemetry
items.purpose: Disables data collection in the Microsoft Edge browser.

items.name: Disable Mozilla Firefox Telemetry
items.purpose: Disables data collection in the Firefox browser.

items.name: Disable Google Chrome Telemetry
items.purpose: Disables data collection in the Chrome browser.

items.name: Disable Media Player Sharing
items.purpose: Stops Windows Media Player from sharing media over the network.

items.name: Enhance Privacy
items.purpose: Applies a range of settings to improve privacy.
items.on: Set-ItemProperty -Path 'HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Policies\DataCollection' -Name 'AllowTelemetry' -Value 0 -Type DWORD -Force; Set-ItemProperty -Path 'HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\DataCollection' -Name 'AllowTelemetry' -Value 0 -Type DWORD -Force; Set-ItemProperty -Path 'HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\AdvertisingInfo' -Name 'Enabled' -Value 0 -Type DWORD -Force
items.off: Set-ItemProperty -Path 'HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Policies\DataCollection' -Name 'AllowTelemetry' -Value 3 -Type DWORD -Force; Set-ItemProperty -Path 'HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\DataCollection' -Name 'AllowTelemetry' -Value 3 -Type DWORD -Force; Set-ItemProperty -Path 'HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\AdvertisingInfo' -Name 'Enabled' -Value 1 -Type DWORD -Force

items.name: Disable Start Menu Ads
items.purpose: Disables promotional content in the Start Menu.
items.on: Set-ItemProperty -Path 'HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\ContentDeliveryManager' -Name 'SubscribedContent-338387Enabled' -Value 0 -Type DWORD -Force; Set-ItemProperty -Path 'HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\ContentDeliveryManager' -Name 'SubscribedContent-353694Enabled' -Value 0 -Type DWORD -Force; Set-ItemProperty -Path 'HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\ContentDeliveryManager' -Name 'SubscribedContent-353696Enabled' -Value 0 -Type DWORD -Force
items.off: Set-ItemProperty -Path 'HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\ContentDeliveryManager' -Name 'SubscribedContent-338387Enabled' -Value 1 -Type DWORD -Force; Set-ItemProperty -Path 'HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\ContentDeliveryManager' -Name 'SubscribedContent-353694Enabled' -Value 1 -Type DWORD -Force; Set-ItemProperty -Path 'HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\ContentDeliveryManager' -Name 'SubscribedContent-353696Enabled' -Value 1 -Type DWORD -Force

items.name: Disable Edge Discover
items.purpose: Disables the 'Discover' feature in the Edge browser.

items.name: Disable Error Reporting
items.purpose: Stops Windows from sending error reports to Microsoft.

items.name: Restore Classic File Explorer
items.purpose: Brings back the old File Explorer ribbon from Windows 10.

items.name: Hide Taskbar Weather
items.purpose: Removes the weather icon from the taskbar.

items.name: Hide Taskbar Search
items.purpose: Hides the search icon and search box from the taskbar.

items.name: Remove Cast to Device
items.purpose: Removes the 'Cast to Device' option from the context menu.

items.name: Align Taskbar to Left
items.purpose: Moves the taskbar icons to the left side of the screen.

items.name: Disable Snap Assist
items.purpose: Disables the feature that helps you arrange app windows on the screen.

items.name: Enable Classic Right-Click Menu
items.purpose: Restores the full-featured right-click context menu.

items.name: Enable Compact Mode in Explorer
items.purpose: Reduces spacing between items in File Explorer.

items.name: Disable Widgets
items.purpose: Removes the Widgets button from the taskbar.

items.name: Disable Chat
items.purpose: Removes the Chat icon (Microsoft Teams) from the taskbar.

items.name: Disable Stickers
items.purpose: Disables the ability to use stickers on the desktop.

items.name: Disable CoPilot AI
items.purpose: Disables the CoPilot AI assistant.

items.name: Show all notification icons
items.purpose: Displays all icons in the taskbar notification area.

items.name: Remove menus delay
items.purpose: Reduces the delay for pop-up menus to appear.

items.name: Restore Classic Photo Viewer
items.purpose: Changes the default photo viewer to the old Windows Photo Viewer.
items.on: New-Item -Path 'HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows Photo Viewer\Capabilities\FileAssociations' -Force; Set-ItemProperty -Path 'HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows Photo Viewer\Capabilities\FileAssociations' -Name '.jpeg' -Value 'PhotoViewer.FileAssoc.Jpeg' -Force; Set-ItemProperty -Path 'HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows Photo Viewer\Capabilities\FileAssociations' -Name '.jpg' -Value 'PhotoViewer.FileAssoc.Jpeg' -Force; Set-ItemProperty -Path 'HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows Photo Viewer\Capabilities\FileAssociations' -Name '.png' -Value 'PhotoViewer.FileAssoc.Png' -Force

items.name: Optimize Network
items.purpose: Adjusts network settings for better throughput and lower latency.

items.name: Disable SMBv1 Protocol
items.purpose: Disables the older, less secure SMBv1 protocol. This protocol is not enabled by default in Windows 11.

items.name: Disable SMBv2 Protocol
items.purpose: Disables the SMBv2 protocol for network file sharing.

items.name: Enable Gaming Mode
items.purpose: Prioritizes system resources for gaming applications.

items.name: Disable Xbox Live
items.purpose: Turns off background Xbox Live services.
items.on: Set-Service -Name XblAuthManager -StartupType Disabled; Stop-Service -Name XblAuthManager -Force; Set-Service -Name XblGameSave -StartupType Disabled; Stop-Service -Name XblGameSave -Force
items.off: Set-Service -Name XblAuthManager -StartupType Automatic; Start-Service -Name XblAuthManager; Set-Service -Name XblGameSave -StartupType Automatic; Start-Service -Name XblGameSave

items.name: Disable Game Bar
items.purpose: Disables the Windows Game Bar overlay.

items.name: Disable Windows Ink
items.purpose: Turns off the Windows Ink Workspace.

items.name: Disable Spell Checking
items.purpose: Disables the automatic spell checker in Windows.

items.name: Disable Cloud Clipboard
items.purpose: Disables the clipboard synchronization across devices.

items.name: Disable Automatic Updates
items.purpose: Stops Windows from automatically downloading and installing updates.
items.on: Set-Service -Name wuauserv -StartupType Disabled; Stop-Service -Name wuauserv -Force; Set-ItemProperty -Path 'HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\WindowsUpdate\AU' -Name 'NoAutoUpdate' -Value 1 -Type DWORD -Force
items.off: Set-Service -Name wuauserv -StartupType Automatic; Start-Service -Name wuauserv; Set-ItemProperty -Path 'HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\WindowsUpdate\AU' -Name 'NoAutoUpdate' -Value 0 -Type DWORD -Force

items.name: Disable Microsoft Store Updates
items.purpose: Prevents apps from the Microsoft Store from updating automatically.

items.name: Disable Insider Service
items.purpose: Disables the Windows Insider Program service.

items.name: Exclude Drivers from Updates
items.purpose: Prevents Windows Update from automatically installing new hardware drivers.
